mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (board_seq, writer, title, content, reg_date) VALUES (#{boardSeq}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT article_id, board_seq, writer, title, content, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, view_cnt FROM article WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET article_id = #{articleId}, board_seq = #{boardSeq}, writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, reg_date = #{regDate}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt} WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
